name: Creme de You Dry-Touch Body Butter
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: A luxurious body creme in the iconic Glossier You fragrance.Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy.Scent Type: Warm & Sheer.Key Notes: Pink Pepper, Iris, Ambrox.Highlighted Ingredients:- Shea Butter: Smooths softens and conditions without feeling greasy..- Jojoba Oils: Provides a silky-smooth feel and keep skin soft and hydrated...What Else You Need to Know: The decadent formula is dermatologist-tested and cruelty-free. Itu2019s suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Sparkling pink pepper, earthy iris, with a warm, slightly-sweet base, this body cream leaves a scent impact that is creamy, salty, warm, and clean.
ingredients: -Shea Butter: Smooths softens and conditions without feeling greasy..-Jojoba Oils: Provides a silky-smooth feel and keep skin soft and hydrated...Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Fragrance/Parfum, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Caprylate, Cellulose, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire de Carnauba, Glyceryl Laurate, Sclerotium Gum, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Phytic Acid, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Hydroxycitronellal, Hexyl Cinnamal, Farnesol, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage all over the body for smooth, moisturized skin that smells soft, warm, and familiaru2014just like you..-Layer under the Glossier You Eau de Parfum or Glossier You Solid for the most impactful expression of you...Recycling Instructions:.-This package is 100% recyclable-ready. .-Clean the jar with soapy warm water. .-Place the jar with glass, and the disc and cap with plastics..-The secondary carton should be recycled with other paper and cardboard.
